document.docAuthor: Li, Yang, He, Jun-Hua & Chen, Xue-Xin
document.masterDocTitle: Review of six genera of Braconinae Nees (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) in China, with the description of eleven new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Review of six genera of Braconinae Nees (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) in China, with the description of eleven new species

figureCitation.captionText-1: FIGURE 44. Stenobracon (Stenobracon) nicevillei (Bingham, 1901). ♀. a. fore wing; b. hind wing; c. mesosoma, lateral view; d. mesosoma, dorsal view; e. metasoma, dorsal view; f. hind leg, lateral view; g. head, front view; h. head, dorsal view; i. head, lateral view; j. sacpus outer side, lateral view.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Stenobracon ( Stenobracon ) nicevillei (Bingham)
:
van Achterberg et Polaszek, 1996: 47
.

Phanaulax levituberculatus Cameron, 1910: 43
. Synonymized by
Chishti et Quicke, 1996: 241
.

Stenobracon levituberculatus (Cameron)
: Fahringer, 1928: 26;
Quicke et Koch, 1990: 224
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material.
1♀ , China , Zhejiang Prov. , Taishun ,
550–950m
,
3.VII.1963
, Jin Gentao, No. 34023675 ( SHEM )
;
1♀ , China , Guangdong Prov. , Yaxian ,
10–15. VI
.1966, He Junhua , No. 66023.4 ( ZJUH )
;
1♂ , China , Yunnan Prov. , Kaiyuan , 5.IX.19??, Tao Shaolin, No. 846481 ( ZJUH )
;
1♂ , China , Yunnan Prov. , Wenshan ,
20.IX.1980
, Sun Zhenyang, No. 811054 ( ZJUH )
.

Biology. The hosts are most species of Pyralidae ( Lepidoptera ), including:
Bissetia steniella (Hampson, 1899)
,
Chilo auricilius (Dudgeon, 1905)
,
Chilo ceylonicus
,
Chilo indicus (Kapur)
,
Chilo infuscatellus Snellen, 1890
,
Chilo partellus (Swinhoe, 1885)
,
Chilo suppressalis (Walker, 1863)
,
Chilo tumidicostalis (Hampson)
,
Chilo zonellus (Swinhoe, 1884)
,
Glaucocharis reniella Wang et Sung, 1988
,
Schoenobius bipunctifer (Walker)
,
Scirpophaga incertulas (Walker, 1863)
,
Scirpophaga innotata (Walker, 1863)
and
Scirpophaga nivella (Fabricius, 1794)
; and one species of Brachodidae ( Lepidoptera ):
Procerata venosata (Walker, 1863)
( Ramakrishna Ayyar 1928 ; Sonan 1944 ; Trehan et Butani 1950 ; Yasumatsu 1967 ; Saxena 1972 ; Nagarkatti et Nair 1973 ; Chou 1981 ; Chishti et Quicke 1996 ;
Yu et al . 2016
).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 43.
Stenobracon ( Stenobracon ) nicevillei ( Bingham, 1901 )
, ♀, habitus lateral.

FIGURE 44.
Stenobracon ( Stenobracon ) nicevillei ( Bingham, 1901 )
. ♀. a. fore wing; b. hind wing; c. mesosoma, lateral view; d. mesosoma, dorsal view; e. metasoma, dorsal view; f. hind leg, lateral view; g. head, front view; h. head, dorsal view; i. head, lateral view; j. sacpus outer side, lateral view.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. China ( Fujian , Guangdong , Guangxi , Guizhou , Hainan , Taiwan , Yunnan, *Zhejiang); Bangladesh , India , Malaysia , Nepal , Pakistan , Philippines , Sri Lanka , Vietnam .

Note. Sonan (1944) first reported this species from Taiwan (SE. China );
Chu et al . (1978)
reported this species from Guangdong and Taiwan (SE. China ), Guizhou (SW. China );
Zheng et al . (1986)
reported this species from Yunnan (SW. China ) and He et Wang (1987) from Fujian , Guangdong and Taiwan (SE. China ), Guangxi , Guizhou and Yunnan (SW. China ); finally,
He et al . (2002)
reported this species from Fujian and Hainan (SE. China ), Guizhou (SW. China ).
